entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -21.1°C
Wind: N 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
